mutations.name: Legendary Crystalline Lattice
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's formation into a perfect crystalline lattice structure
mutations.effectDescription: Increases particle density by 40% and stability by 50%, creating an extremely resilient formation

mutations.name: Legendary Quantum Field
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's formation into a quantum probability field
mutations.effectDescription: Particles exist in multiple states simultaneously, greatly increasing range but reducing stability

mutations.name: Legendary Solar Corona
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's formation into a miniature solar corona
mutations.effectDescription: Particles form a radial pattern with extreme energy output, significantly increasing attack power

mutations.name: Legendary Neural Network
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's formation into an advanced neural network
mutations.effectDescription: Particles form an interconnected network that processes information at incredible speeds
